description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
Tufnell Park Hall of Residence, Huddleston Road, Square, Islington, London, N7 0EG

TPO Reference
T4 Ash of LBI TPO (No.242) 2002
T15 Sycamore of LBI TPO (No.242) 2002
T16 Sycamore of LBI TPO (No.242) 2002
T17 Sycamore of LBI TPO (No.242) 2002


PO Number
TO90132

Work specifications
1 x Ash (T4) western corner of the site adjacent to the new halls of residence building
Crown reduce by a maximum of 2m to balance shape of crown from the pruning had already undertaken to permit the construction of the building
Remove Deadwood

1 x Sycamore (T15) adjacent to southern boundary near to the western corner
Crown thin by a maximum of 10-15%
Remove deadwood

1 x Sycamore (T16) adjacent to southern boundary in the south western corner of the site.
Crown reduce by a maximum of 20-25% shaped to produce even and balanced crown.
Remove Deadwood

1 x Sycamore (T17) adjacent to eastern boundary
Crown reduce to previous reduction points, shaped to produce even and balanced crown.
Remove Deadwood
